name: WORKPRO Staple Gun, 6-in-1, Manual Brad Nailer with 4000 Counts Staples, Upholstery Stapler Nail Gun for Fixing Material, Decoration, Carpentry, Furniture, Doors and Windows
short_description: Perfect Present for Any Occasion: This versatile staple gun makes an excellent gift for Christmas, Mother’s Day, birthdays, anniversaries, Valentine’s Day, and more

6-in-1 Function: The staple gun features a practical “6-in-1” function, compatible with six types of staples/nails: T50, JT21, T20, T25, 18 Gauge Brad Nails, and PIN. This eliminates the need to frequently switch between different staple guns

Unique Dual Power Lever: The staple gun includes a dual power lever with High/Low settings, making it effective for both hard and soft materials. Ideal for weather stripping, insulation, small fencing, upholstery, and other stapling projects

Ease of Use: No need to adjust for different types of staples or nails. Simply load them before use. The patented mechanism prevents jamming, and the quick-release bottom magazine allows for fast and easy reloading. The rubberized grip features an ergonomic hand slot designed to minimize hand fatigue during extended use
Unmatched Handle Lock Design: The retractable handle-lock saves space during storage. Ensure all staples are removed before locking; press the handle down and pull it outward to engage the lock

What You Get: The set includes 1 piece of the 6-in-1 staple gun and 4,000 staples/nails. It contains four types of staples/nails: T50, JT21, T25, and 18 Gauge Brad Nails, with 1,000 of each type. This assortment covers most of your project needs

product_description: Our SSTGU81 Bond Heavy Duty Hand Stapler is your go-to tool for efficient stapling across a variety of applications. Designed for precision and durability, our plier stapler was designed to aid in crafting, upholstery, office, and construction projects. Whether you’re stapling fabric, paper, or heavier materials, our handheld stapler provides consistent performance every time. Our heavy-duty plier stapler combines power with comfort. The ergonomic handle reduces hand strain, making it helpful for long hours of use, whether in the workshop, at home, or at the office. Our metal stapler is built to withstand demanding conditions and frequent use, offering long-lasting durability for both industrial and commercial environments. It’s designed to tackle tough materials like fabric, upholstery, or even carpets with strong, secure staples every time. Our Bond SSTGU81 Heavy Duty Hand Stapler is a handheld stapler that can handle a wide range of materials, including paper, fabric, and carpets, and works effectively as a fabric stapler for upholstery or an industrial stapler for heavy-duty constructions, allowing a flexible design that can assist in any DIY project. With easy staple loading, you’ll spend less time reloading and more time working on your projects. Our industrial stapler uses 24/8 staples, compatible with standard sizes for effortless stapling. Its sleek silver finish gives it a professional appearance, making it a stylish addition to any workspace. Our Bond SSTGU81 Heavy Duty Hand Stapler is a must-have for anyone who needs a versatile, durable, and powerful stapler. Whether you need a fabric stapler for upholstery, a commercial stapler heavy duty for office tasks, or a plier stapler for crafting, this stapler meets all your needs. Reliable, comfortable, and built to last, our handheld metal stapler will help you tackle any stapling task with confidence.

product_description: The Spec Ops M8E Elite Chevron Crown Plier Stapler is a general-purpose plier stapler for extreme duty plier stapling applications including store operations, restaurants, pharmacies, dry cleaning, laundry services, manufacturing, industrial and light packaging. Uses Spec Ops M8 chevron crown to staple up to 25 sheets of paper with ¼” length staples or up to 45 sheets of paper with 3/8” leg length staples. The top-load design makes for lightning-quick reloading for improved productivity while the jam-free technology eliminates frustrating staple jams. The Reduced Effort Drive Technology is combined with an ergonomic design for reduced effort stapling and improved operator comfort. This plier stapler features a heat-treated, all-metal construction for superior performance and extreme durability to survive repeated drops and heavy abuse. All Spec Ops tools are backed by our five-star, hassle-free lifetime warranty, and with each purchase made, we support our nation’s heroes by donating 3% of proceeds to veteran and first responder causes.

Made with durable all-metal construction, this stapler is sure to last a long time and withstand a great of stapling.
